page.title: 05MARGARET THATCHER part 1
page.content: MARGARET HILDA THATCHER (nee ROBERST) WAS BORN IN GRANTHAM,LINCS. ON {13th {OCTOBER 1925}AND WILL CELEBRATE HER {60th BIRTHDAY}LATER THIS YEAR (1985). SHE OBTAINED HER DEGREE IN SCIENCE FROM OXFORD(1946) AND STARTED HER POLITICAL CAREER IN ESSEX. IN{1951}SHE WAS SECOND IN THE{DARTFORD ELECTION,THE SAME DAY SHE BECAME ENGAGED TO DENNIS THATCHER. 1951 SAW HER{MARRIAGE}TO NR DENNIS THATCHER, A MANAGING DIRECTOR OF THE FAMILY PAINT FIRM. ON 20th OCTOBER 1959 MRS T WON THE {FINCHLEY SEAT}AND SO ENTERED PARLIAMENT. TWO YEARS LATER (OCT 1961) AFTER LOTS OF EXTREMELY HARD WORK IN THE HOUSE, HAROLD MACMILLAN(PM) PROMOTED HER TO THE{CABINET,}RESPONSIBLE FOR PENSIONS AND NATIONAL INSURANCE.
